content: braveheart neckwarmer cabled neckwarmerwith moss stich edges twisted ropes and central braid panel 3 balls jamieson s of shetland heather aran 50g 92m per ball colour shown is 1070 woodnymph pair of 5mm needles or whatever size necessary to meet gauge below pair of 4 5mm needles or needles 0 5mm smaller than those needed to meet gauge cable needle sirdar elegant 669 celtic knot buttons x 2 or other 25-28mm buttons of your choice gauge 18sts and 24 row to 10cm in stocking stitch using 5mm needles or whatever size necessary to meet gauge abbreviations c6b slip next 3 stitches on to cable needle and hold at back of work k3 then k3 from cable needle c6f -slip next 3 stitches on to cable needle and hold at front of work k3 then k3 from cable needle c4b slip next 2 stitches on to cable needle and hold at back of work k2 then k2 from cable needle c4f -slip next 2 stitches on to cable needle and hold at front of work k2 then k2 from cable needle cr3b slip next stitch on to cable needle and hold at back of work k2 then p1 from cable needle cl3f slip next 2 stitches on to cable needle and hold at front of work p1 then k2 from cable needle cr4b -slip next 2 stitches on to cable needle and hold at back of work k2 then p2 from cable needle cl4f -slip next 2 stitches on to cable needle and hold at front of work p2 then k2 from cable needle there is a very helpful you tube video for the three row yarn over buttonhole technique knitting with suzanne bryan -a variety of buttonholes in 2x2 ribbing this pattern uses the second variant pattern the central braid panel is worked on a 16 row repeat and 13 sets will be worked i have highlighted this in blue text the twisted rope is worked on a 6 row repeat i have highlighted this in red text using 4 5mm needles cast on 50 stitches row 1 k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row row 2 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row repeat the above row 5 times 12 row in total ending with a wrong side row change to 5mm needles row 1 - k1 p1 k1 p2 k6 p2 p2 c4b p2 3 times p2 k6 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 row 2 - p1 k1 p1 k2 p6 k2 k2 p4 k2 3 times k2 p6 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 3 - k1 p1 k1 p2 k6 p2 p1 cr3b cl4f cr4b 2 times cl3f p1 p2 k6 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 row 4 - p1 k1 p1 k2 p6 k2 k1 p2 k3 p4 k4 p4 k3 p2 k1 k2 p6 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 5- k1 p1 k1 p2 c6b p2 cr3b p1 p2 c4f p2 2 times p1 cl3f p2 c6f
